alert.note: Alert for Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Richland; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:05PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Roosevelt, northeastern McCone and northern Richland Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 305 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Culbertson, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poplar, Culbertson, Brockton, Sprole, Snowden, Fort Kipp and Nohly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
